Name: Bot Vice
About the game: Show off your skills & reflexes in this frantic gallery shooter action arcade, filled with bullets, bots and explosions. You play as Erin Saver , carrying out her personal vendetta against the criminal Wildbots . Super intense arcade shooting action. One unique challenging boss per stage! Unlockable 'Extra Missions' mode. Three difficulty modes: Hard, Normal and Easy. Polished and colorful pixel art visuals. Catchy 90's synth-rock soundtrack.
